featured.text: Sincerely yours, Eleanor Lightly Spokeswoman and Company Hair Stylist ABC Activity Insurance: Insure against overdoing it 41.

definition.zh_def: 保險，為了防範風險而支付保險費用以獲得保障。
definition.en_def: To provide or obtain insurance for something, typically to protect against financial loss.
definition.example: You should insure your car to protect it from theft or damage.
